original_text: And the keeper of the prison put Joseph in charge of all the prisoners who were in the prison. Whatever was done there, he was the one who did it.
korean_text: 간수장이 옥중 죄수를 다 요셉의 손에 맡기므로 그 제반 사무를 요셉이 처리하고

sentences.original_text: And the keeper of the prison put Joseph in charge
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 감옥 간수는 요셉을 책임자로 임명했고

sentences.original_text: of all the prisoners who were in the prison
he was the one who did it
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 바로 그 일을 하는 사람이었더라
